title: Poetry In Motion
description: "A picture is worth 1,000 words. Most people know this saying. On the flip side 1,000 words can paint a picture."-from back cover of Poetry In MotionSimone Frances Reed uses her words like a painter uses a paint brush. She paints many different pictures of a wide range of emotions that many can relate to. Simone Frances Reed shows the process of working through emotions in order to heal from them.Poetry is about self discovery. You cannot help but feel as she takes you through the rollar coaster that is life and brings you safely to the sunny side of the darkest cloud.
author: Simone Frances Reed
